_header: I was born in a stall / Between beasts two
_description: The Story of Christ’s Sufferings — thirteen quatrains (abab) and burden: ‘Shall I moder shall I / Shall I do soo / Shall I dye for mannys sake / And I never synned thereto’

OxfBal354.First Lines: I was born in a stallBetwen bestis two…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…Send vs all his blessyng& send vs all good
                    resteExplicit
